synopsis.text: This enchanting anime follows the journey of Yuu, a bright and lively 10-year-old girl who encounters a group of aliens with a broken spaceship. As a token of gratitude for her help, the aliens grant her a magical wand, which comes with a secret power and two feline guardians, Posi and Nega. With this newfound power, Yuu can transform into a captivating 17-year-old idol named Creamy Mami. As Creamy Mami, she captures the hearts of many, including her childhood crush Toshio, who remains oblivious to her true identity. Balancing her life as a schoolgirl, helping her parents at their crepe shop, and maintaining her secret identity as an idol, Yuu must navigate the challenges and triumphs that come her way, all while trying to win Toshio's affection.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
